name: knowledge-vault-extension
description: Browser extension for Knowledge Vault - save and manage knowledge from anywhere on the web

scripts.pack: cp manifest.json manifest.json.bak && zip -r knowledge-vault-extension-chrome.zip . -x 'build.js' 'manifest-firefox.json' 'manifest.json.bak' 'node_modules/*' '.DS_Store' '*.md' '*-debug.js' 'package.json' && mv manifest.json.bak manifest.json
scripts.pack:firefox: cp manifest.json manifest.json.bak && cp manifest-firefox.json manifest.json && zip -r knowledge-vault-extension-firefox.zip . -x 'build.js' 'manifest-firefox.json' 'manifest.json.bak' 'node_modules/*' '.DS_Store' '*.md' '*-debug.js' 'package.json' && mv manifest.json.bak manifest.json
scripts.pack:all: npm run pack && npm run pack:firefox
scripts.dev: echo 'Load the extension folder directly in Chrome for development'

author: Mridul Tailor
